Topic.Title: One Soda Per Day Raises Diabetes Risk, Study Suggests

Message.Msg: Did you think this was breaking news? Nobody denies that consuming sugary beverages increases the risk of diabetes, just like drinking alcohol daily increases the risk of liver disease, driving to and from work every day increases the chances of dying in a car accident, and posting outlandish alarmist threads like these increases the chances that you are a complete moron.

Message.Title: HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!
Message.Msg: HFCS is a cheap sweetener which is highly toxic. Why are cases of diabetes steadily increasing, HFCS!!! This toxic poison is far from natural cane sugar. Coke uses HFCS instead of cane sugar because its cheaper and sweeter but when consumed is toxic, they do not care about your health. This poison spikes your blood sugar much higher than sugar and will trigger every disease known to man, do some research!!!
